mapper.select: SELECT b.REGION_NUM as regionNum , b.REGION_LEVEL_1 as regionLevel1 , b.REGION_LEVEL_2 as regionLevel2 , b.REGION_LEVEL_3 as regionLevel3 , b.REGION_LEVEL_4 as regionLevel4 FROM PLAN_REGION a JOIN REGION b ON a.REGION_NUM = b.REGION_NUM WHERE a.PLAN_NUM = #{planNum};

SELECT REGION_NUM as regionNum , REGION_LEVEL_1 as regionLevel1 , REGION_LEVEL_2 as regionLevel2 , REGION_LEVEL_3 as regionLevel3 , REGION_LEVEL_4 as regionLevel4 FROM REGION WHERE REGION_NUM = #{regionNum};

SELECT REGION_NUM AS regionNum , REGION_LEVEL_1 AS regionLevel1 , REGION_LEVEL_2 AS regionLevel2 , REGION_LEVEL_3 AS regionLevel3 , REGION_LEVEL_4 AS regionLevel4 FROM REGION WHERE ( REGION_LEVEL_1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionQuery}, '%') OR REGION_LEVEL_2 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionQuery}, '%') OR REGION_LEVEL_3 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionQuery}, '%') OR REGION_LEVEL_4 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionQuery}, '%') ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN REGION_LEVEL_1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionQuery}, '%') THEN 1 WHEN REGION_LEVEL_2 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionQuery}, '%') THEN 2 WHEN REGION_LEVEL_3 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionQuery}, '%') THEN 3 WHEN REGION_LEVEL_4 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionQuery}, '%') THEN 4 ELSE 5 END LIMIT 10;
